author_name: Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad Abū Isḥāq aṯ-Ṯaʿlabī

tafsir_name: Ǧāmiʿ al-bayān ʿan taʾwīl āy al-Qurʾān

author_name: Muḥammad al-Amīn ibn Muḥammad al-Muḫtār ibn ʿAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧakanī aš-Šanqīṭī
tafsir_name: Aḍwāʾ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-Qurʾān bi-l-Qurʾān
Tafsīr Bayān as-saʿāda fī maqāmāt al-ʿibāda
Aysar at-tafāsīr: tafsīr, asbāb nuzūl, aḥādīṯ, namāḏiǧ iʿrāb

author_name: Muḥammad ibn ʿAlī ibn Muḥammad aš-Šawkānī
Aḥmad ʿAlī Muḥammad ʿAlī al-Aʿqam al-Ānisī
Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn ʿAzīz as-Siǧistānī
